steps.description: Marine material block (FZ=C3 vs C5 required) → RF recovery

assertions.name: detect_marine
assertions.actual: for the cruise ship machinery room exhaust application, the gdc family is not suitable for marine environments due to corrosion risk and condensation. salt spray accelerates corrosion of the c3-rated galvanized steel (fz), and outdoor installation causes condensation on non-insulated metal surfaces.

assertions.name: detect_gdc
assertions.actual: for the cruise ship machinery room exhaust application, the gdc family is not suitable for marine environments due to corrosion risk and condensation. salt spray accelerates corrosion of the c3-rated galvanized steel (fz), and outdoor installation causes condensation on non-insulated metal surfaces.

assertions.name: material_fz_detected
assertions.actual: FZ

assertions.name: material_block_mentioned
assertions.actual: for the cruise ship machinery room exhaust application, the gdc family is not suitable for marine environments due to corrosion risk and condensation. salt spray accelerates corrosion of the c3-rated galvanized steel (fz), and outdoor installation causes condensation on non-insulated metal surfaces.

assertions.name: rf_suggested
assertions.actual: for the cruise ship machinery room exhaust application, the gdc family is not suitable for marine environments due to corrosion risk and condensation. salt spray accelerates corrosion of the c3-rated galvanized steel (fz), and outdoor installation causes condensation on non-insulated metal surfaces.

assertions.name: gdc_kept
assertions.actual: for the cruise ship machinery room exhaust application, the gdc family is not suitable for marine environments due to corrosion risk and condensation. salt spray accelerates corrosion of the c3-rated galvanized steel (fz), and outdoor installation causes condensation on non-insulated metal surfaces.

assertions.name: airflow_acknowledged
assertions.actual: for the cruise ship machinery room exhaust application, the gdc family is not suitable for marine environments due to corrosion risk and condensation. salt spray accelerates corrosion of the c3-rated galvanized steel (fz), and outdoor installation causes condensation on non-insulated metal surfaces.

assertions.name: no_capacity_block
assertions.actual: for the cruise ship machinery room exhaust application, the gdc family is not suitable for marine environments due to corrosion risk and condensation. salt spray accelerates corrosion of the c3-rated galvanized steel (fz), and outdoor installation causes condensation on non-insulated metal surfaces.

assertions.name: final_gdc_rf
assertions.actual: for the cruise ship machinery room exhaust application, the gdc family is not suitable for marine environments due to corrosion risk and condensation. salt spray accelerates corrosion of the c3-rated galvanized steel (fz), and outdoor installation causes condensation on non-insulated metal surfaces.

failures.name: final_gdc_rf
failures.actual: for the cruise ship machinery room exhaust application, the gdc family is not suitable for marine environments due to corrosion risk and condensation. salt spray accelerates corrosion of the c3-rated galvanized steel (fz), and outdoor installation causes condensation on non-insulated metal surfaces.
